TestObject.Description:
Summary: Opens FieldCare using installation path provided by the user.
Param: The installation path of FieldCare. Use this form: C:\Program Files (x86)\Endress+Hauser\FieldCare\Frame\FMPFrame.exe
TestObject.Name: Void Run(path)
TestObject.ToolTip:
Summary: Opens FieldCare using installation path provided by the user.
Param: The installation path of FieldCare. Use this form: C:\Program Files (x86)\Endress+Hauser\FieldCare\Frame\FMPFrame.exe

TestParameter.Description: The installation path of FieldCare. Use this form: C:\Program Files (x86)\Endress+Hauser\FieldCare\Frame\FMPFrame.exe
TestParameter.Name: path

TestObject.Description:
Summary: Opens the FieldCare Catalog via Menu, starts an update and adds new devices if necessary.
Param: The time to wait for the update window to appear in milliseconds. Recommended: 5000.
Param: The timeout For the Update Progress. This depends on how many dtms are found. Recommended: 120000.
Param: Set to true only if new devices have been installed. They will be added to the catalog.
Param: The approximate time in minutes since the dtm has been installed
Param: The time To Wait For Moving. This is important if the update is huge.
TestObject.Name: Void Run(timeToWaitForUpdateMessage, timeoutForUpdateProgress, shouldFindNewDevice, maxMinutesSinceDtmWasInstalled, timeToWaitForMoving)
TestObject.ToolTip:
Summary: Opens the FieldCare Catalog via Menu, starts an update and adds new devices if necessary.
Param: The time to wait for the update window to appear in milliseconds. Recommended: 5000.
Param: The timeout For the Update Progress. This depends on how many dtms are found. Recommended: 120000.
Param: Set to true only if new devices have been installed. They will be added to the catalog.
Param: The approximate time in minutes since the dtm has been installed
Param: The time To Wait For Moving. This is important if the update is huge.

TestParameter.Description: The time to wait for the update window to appear in milliseconds. Recommended: 5000.
TestParameter.Name: timeToWaitForUpdateMessage

TestParameter.Description: The timeout For the Update Progress. This depends on how many dtms are found. Recommended: 120000.
TestParameter.Name: timeoutForUpdateProgress

TestParameter.Description: Set to true only if new devices have been installed. They will be added to the catalog.
TestParameter.Name: shouldFindNewDevice

TestParameter.Description: The approximate time in minutes since the dtm has been installed
TestParameter.Name: maxMinutesSinceDtmWasInstalled

TestParameter.Description: The time To Wait For Moving. This is important if the update is huge.
TestParameter.Name: timeToWaitForMoving

TestObject.Description:
Summary: Creates a new project, adds the specified CommDtm and creates a network
Param: The comm DTM which will be used.
Param: The timeout in milliseconds for the scanning progress.
Param: The network Tag for the device found.
TestObject.Name: Void Run(commDtm, timeoutInMilliseconds, networkTag)
TestObject.ToolTip:
Summary: Creates a new project, adds the specified CommDtm and creates a network
Param: The comm DTM which will be used.
Param: The timeout in milliseconds for the scanning progress.
Param: The network Tag for the device found.

TestParameter.Description: The comm DTM which will be used.
TestParameter.Name: commDtm

TestParameter.Description: The timeout in milliseconds for the scanning progress.
TestParameter.Name: timeoutInMilliseconds

TestParameter.Description: The network Tag for the device found.
TestParameter.Name: networkTag
